titleStmt.title: Charles Gahres and Martha J. Gahres v. Isabella Sutton and W. H. Barrett. Plaintiffs Complaint.

publicationStmt.authority: Bring Me the Body: A Digital & Print History of Marginalized Habeas Corpus Petitioners in the North American West, 1804-1912

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Charles Gahres and Martha J. Gahres v. Isabella Sutton and W. H. Barrett. Plaintiffs Complaint.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: In the District Court of the first Judicial District Before Hon. J R Kennedy Judge at Chambers
Charles Gahres & Martha J. Gahres, Guardians of Etty Dora Cravens a minor Plffs
Isabella Sutton and W. H. Barrett Defts
Charles Gahres and Martha J. Gahres (formally Martha J. Cranens) the above and hereinafter plffs for complaint against Isabella Sutton and Richard W. H. Barrett the above and hereinafter defts allege

1st That they Plffs are the legal parents and maternal and lawful guardians of Etty Dora Cravens a minor child of the age of five years that said child is the child of one of the Martha J. Gahres Plff by a family marriage with one Wm A. Cranen
that in June 1869 said marriage was and said child afterwords as a term of the Circuit Court of the 5th Judicial District of Oregon on river the of said marriage with said Cravens the said Plffs (to wit Martha J. Gahres) has intermarried with the other Plff herein and they Plffs are now an aforesaid the guardians of said minor child and entitled to the sole custody of said child.

2nd That the said minor child of those Plffs to wit said Etty Dora Cravens is wrongfully and unlawfully detained and restrained of her liberty by the said Defendants Isabella Sutton and Richard W. H. Barrett at the town of Wallalo in the said County of Walla Walla and Territory of Washington

3rd That the course of said restraint of said minor child by said Defts is according to the best knowledge and belief of these plffs an arbitrary determination on the part of Defts to keep said child without any closing right whatever to the custody thereof

4th That said retraints and detention of said minor child is illegal and that the illegality thereof in the withholding the custody of said child from these Plffs who are the lawful guardians of said minor and as such entitled thereto

Wherefore Plffs or guardians of said minor pray that a writ of Habeas Corpus be issue directed to said Isabella Sutton and Richard W.H. Barrett commanding them to have the body of said minor child Etty Dora Cravens before the Honorable Judge of the Court at a time and place to be specified by said Judge and then and there to do and receive what shall then and there be considered by said Honorable Judge concerning said minor child together with the terms and course of her detention and said writ and that said minor child may be restored to the custody of these plffs
and for costs of said
